backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and state for delivery orders, riders, users, photos, and access control, using Maps for storage and providing various order-related structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping design and UI update requirements to specific frontend files and components with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, hooks, UI components, and utility functions.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, setting color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, manifest, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, orientation, and icon files.
frontend/public/sw.js: Simple service worker handling install, fetch caching, and activation with versioned static asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication redirects, service worker registration, and theme provider around the main app.
frontend/src/areas/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Wraps the admin interface, handling authentication, logout, and tab-based navigation between admin sections.
frontend/src/areas/admin/auth/AdminLogin: Provides the admin login form with username/password validation and triggers session creation on success.
frontend/src/areas/admin/auth/useAdminAu: Implements simple localStorage-based admin authentication with login, logout, and session validation.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminCrea: Form page for creating a new order, validating inputs and submitting via the admin order creation hook.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminDash: Displays admin KPIs such as order counts, earnings, and active riders using fetched order and rider data.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminOrde: Shows detailed order information with options to assign riders, update status, and view parcel/proof photos.
Displays and filters admin orders, with navigation to order detail or creation pages.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminRepo: Generates order reports by period and supports CSV export and printing.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminRide: Manages rider list with add, edit location, and delete actions.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminSett: Handles company settings, logo upload, and delivery rate management.
frontend/src/areas/customer/components/C: Renders bottom tabs for customer navigation using a mobile-friendly component.
frontend/src/areas/customer/CustomerShel: Hosts customer pages and bottom navigation for booking, orders, and profile.
frontend/src/areas/customer/pages/Custom: Allows customers to submit new delivery orders with optional parcel photos.
Displays detailed info for a customer’s order, including status, addresses, and any parcel or proof photos, with a back button.
Shows the customer’s list of orders with status badges and opens the detail page when an order is selected.
Shows customer profile info, app install option, and supports logging out and clearing identity data.
frontend/src/areas/rider/components/Ride: Defines the rider bottom navigation tabs and passes them to the shared mobile nav component.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderOrde: Displays rider-specific order details with navigation, pickup/delivery actions, and proof photo upload.
Shows the rider’s assigned orders list with status and opens the detail view when selected.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderProf: Shows rider profile info, app install option, and supports logout and clearing user data.
frontend/src/areas/rider/RiderShell.tsx: Provides the main rider layout switching between orders and profile tabs with a bottom nav bar.
frontend/src/components/actions/WhatsApp: Modal dialog showing a WhatsApp message with a copy-to-clipboard action and success/error feedback.
Triggers WhatsApp contact link for an order and provides a fallback dialog to view and copy the message.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied card with options to go back or sign out by clearing user data and identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSurfac: Wrapper component providing a full-height app surface container with optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar on mobile with icon tabs and active state handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageConta: Centered page container with optional bottom-nav spacing and customizable styling.
frontend/src/components/patterns/EmptySt: Card component for empty states with an icon, title, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoCapt: Provides camera-based or file-based photo selection with a full-screen camera dialog and capture flow.
frontend/src/components/pwa/FloatingInst: Floating action button prompting PWA installation with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Full-width button to trigger PWA install flow with install/loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, creating, assigning, and updating orders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRiders.ts: React-query hooks for managing riders including fetching, adding, updating location, and client-side deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSettings.ts: Provides hooks to load, update, and persist admin settings, logo, and delivery rates using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches current user profile and admin status from the actor and provides a helper to clear cached user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exposes hooks to create orders and fetch user or single order data, with query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotoUploads.ts: Adds hooks for uploading parcel and proof photos and invalidates related order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt detection on Android, tracks installability, and exposes an install action.
frontend/src/hooks/useRiderActions.ts: Provides a hook to update order status and refresh related queries after updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color themes, animations, and print styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page UI and triggers Internet Identity login with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: React page for creating a user profile, allowing entry of name and selection of role before saving via backend actor.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/adminKpis.ts: Provides helper functions to filter orders by date/status, compute active riders, and calculate daily/monthly earnings.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and Google Maps URLs, builds predefined messages, and offers clipboard copy utilities.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts files to byte arrays, creates image URLs from bytes, and revokes generated object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Computes report metrics for orders over different periods and exports them as a CSV file.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's PWA vision, architectural guidelines, admin panel requirements, known issues, and existing feature records for the delivery app.
